Initializer# init(pixelFormat:width:height:usage:mipmapsMode:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS

```
init(
    pixelFormat: MTLPixelFormat,
    width: Int,
    height: Int,
    usage: MTLTextureUsage,
    mipmapsMode: TextureResource.MipmapsMode
)
```
